output.client_console:
gcc -c -o gfclient.o -Wall --std=gnu99 -g3 -Wno-format-security -fsanitize=address -fno-omit-frame-pointer -Wno-format-security gfclient.c
gcc -c -o bvtgfclient_main.o -Wall --std=gnu99 -g3 -Wno-format-security -fsanitize=address -fno-omit-frame-pointer -Wno-format-security bvtgfclient_main.c
gcc -o bvtgfclient_main -Wall --std=gnu99 -g3 -Wno-format-security -fsanitize=address -fno-omit-frame-pointer -Wno-format-security gfclient.o bvtgfclient_main.o -lpthread -static-libasan

tests.description: Tests that the client properly handles prematurely closed connection during transfer of the message body
Tests that the client properly handles prematurely closed connection during transfer of the message header
Tests that the client properly handles an ERROR response
Tests that the client properly handles a FILE_NOT_FOUND response
Tests that the client properly handles an invalid header
Tests that valgrind shows no memory leaks
Tests that the client properly handles an OK response and long message (more than 5MB) sent in varying size chunks between 64 bytes and 64KB
Tests that the client properly handles an OK response and a short message (less than 1000 bytes)
